import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { deleteFromCart } from '../Redux/Slice/cartSlice'; function Cart() { const dispatch = useDispatch() //to hold total price of products const [total,setTotal]=useState(0) const cartArray = useSelector((state)=> state.cartReducer) return (
{ cartArray.length>0?cartArray.map((item,index)=>( )):"empty cart" }
Id Name Image Price Action
{index+1} {item.title} { } {item.price} dispatch(deleteFromCart(item.id))} className='fa-solid fa-trash text-danger'>

Cart Summary

Total Cart Item : {cartArray.length}
Total Price : {cartArray.price}
) } export default Cart
